markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)

If you uninstall and reinstall the GCash app on your device or clear your app cache, you'll see a message that says, "It looks like you uninstalled GCash or cleared your app data." Watch the video below to learn what to do if you uninstalled/reinstalled GCash or reset your registered phone.

Follow the steps below to access your GCash if you uninstalled/reinstalled GCash:

1. Log in to your GCash app
2. Tap **I want to register this phone.**
3. Take the selfie scan or enter your OTP

You’ll receive an SMS once your phone has been successfully registered.

### **Need more Help?**
